title: "Team First to Successfully Scale Deep Neural Network Models for Federated Learning Framework"
excerpt: "A new machine-learning (ML) framework for clients with varied computing resources is the first of its kind to successfully scale deep neural network (DNN) models like those used to detect and recognize objects in still and video images."
